msbt.message: Today is a day for celebration! It's 's birthday! Let's be sure to make it fabulous!
is absolutely aglow today, don't you think?I certainly hope I look THAT radiant on MY birthday, .
I LOVE celebrating birthdays, don't you, ? Everyone is just sohappy!I admit, seeing enjoy big day today makes me excited for my own birthday!

I don't think I've met you yet. I'm .<10_4 /> It's a pleasure to meet you. It's my friend 's birthday today, so we're throwing a party and here I am, making a new friend! It's almost like it's MY birthday!
The years really do have a way of adding up, don't they, ?Of course, I like to think that no matter how many you add, they always equal a more fabulous you.
is taking another step along the path of life today. It's a path we all must travel. Fortunately, each path is unique. In fact, I like to think mine looks like a fashion runway, .
It's not a birthday without a cake. But WHY must it always be cake? Who decided THAT, ? One of these days we should stick a candle in just to spice things up a bit!
Birthdays bring back such memories! I can still taste the cake that Mother used to bake for me. I wish I could recreate that flavor, but it never comes out quite right, .
We want to make feel truly special today, so we put up all of these birthday decorations. Of course, once you start something like this, it's easy to get carried away, .
I do believe has been looking forward to getting a present from you.

If you don't know what to get someone for a birthday present, you can always rely on the classics.After all, it's the thought that counts. And if you still just can't decide, get them something they can use.
It looks like likes the birthday gift I gave .I picked it out because I thought it would be perfect. And it looks like I was right!

Why, ! I have moved to this island! Yes, yesâ€”it's true, ! And wouldn't you know it, I was invited to 's birthday party today. I simply can't believe we get to celebrate together. How fabulous is that, darling?

?! Fancy seeing you here! Did you know I moved to this island? Well, it just so happens, we're having a birthday party for . Please, jump right in and celebrate with us, . I promise you'll have a wonderful time.
Oh, it's nice to meet you! Are you 's friend?You know, we're celebrating 's birthday with a party. The more the merrier, that's MY motto, ! Which is my way of sayingjoin the fun!
Oh, it's nice to meet you! Are you 's friend?You know, we're celebrating 's birthday with a party. The more the merrier, that's MY motto, ! Which is my way of sayingjoin the fun!
I do approve of the dual celebration. That is, Valentine's Day and one's birthday, .It takes the focus away from the adding up of years, you see!
Here's a gift too!
I hear you.
Ah, birthdays bring back such memories. I can still taste the various cakes of my youthBut today is Valentine's Day as well! And there are other sweets to savor, .
Here's a sweet gift!
Enjoy!
We want to make feel truly special today, so we put up all of these birthday decorations. Of course, it's also Valentine's Day, so we worked in some extremely subtle Valentine's themes
Here's your valentine!
Cool. Nice job!
